_sText: A zombie riot map i made that can be used in zriot or other similar zombie mode (probably not zombie reloaded) servers. The map takes place in some kind of zombie hideout/sanctuary or bunker of sorts. The zombies are meant to look like they jumped the fence (originally the map would have zombies spawn on the outside of the outside area and jump down onto the grass but navmesh wouldn't work correctly), and zombies have to break through 2 layers of a door and a couple of crates in the way. There is a lot of concrete barriers and concrete bags in the way to slow down zombies and to bob in weave around them, a lot of grenades stored in the map (including smoke grenades, mostly used if poison smoke is installed like the UNLOZE or Zombiemonde zombie riot servers), has a weapon room to buy weapons and is where the ct buyzone is located and a medic room. Read me txt file for installation in dl/.rar file or file info link.
